mapper.sql: id, college_id, guide_date, name, audited, fabu, fabuState, busLine, datum, reportingTime, publicServiceId, yktId, trafficBusId, guideline,area
mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM map_newstuguide_route d where d.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

select * from ( select a.uName,a.uid,a.name,a.id,a.busLine,a.datum,a.reportingTime,a.guideline, a.publicService,a.x,a.y,a.xs,a.ys,a.tid,a.layerId,a.color,a.lineweight, site.x sitex,site.y sitey,site.name siteName, a.publicServiceId,a.trafficBusId,a.yktId from ( SELECT route.uName,route.uid,route.name,route.id,route.busLine,route.datum,route.reportingTime,route.guideline, item.name publicService,item.x,item.y,item.xs,item.ys,item.id tid,item.layerId,item.color,item.lineweight, route.publicServiceId,route.trafficBusId,route.yktId from (select unit.name uName,unit.id uid,route.name,route.id,route.publicServiceId,route.trafficBusId,route.yktId, route.busLine,route.datum,route.reportingTime,route.guideline from map_unit_label unit LEFT JOIN map_newstuguide_route route on unit.id = route.college_id where route.fabu = 1 and unit.id = #{id} ) route LEFT JOIN map_layer_item item on (item.id = route.publicServiceId or item.id = route.trafficBusId or item.id = route.yktId) where item.deleted = 0 ) a LEFT JOIN map_newstuguide_site site on site.route_id = a.id ) a
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into map_newstuguide_route (id, college_id, guide_date, name, audited, fabu, fabuState, busLine, datum, reportingTime, publicServiceId, yktId, trafficBusId, guideline,area) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{college_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guide_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audited,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fabu,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fabuState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{busLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yktId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trafficBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guideline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{area,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update map_newstuguide_route
college_id = #{college_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guide_date = #{guide_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audited = #{audited,jdbcType=BIT},
fabu = #{fabu,jdbcType=BIT},
fabuState = #{fabuState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
busLine = #{busLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datum = #{datum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reportingTime = #{reportingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publicServiceId = #{publicServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yktId = #{yktId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trafficBusId = #{trafficBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guideline = #{guideline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update map_newstuguide_route set college_id = #{college_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guide_date = #{guide_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audited = #{audited,jdbcType=BIT}, fabu = #{fabu,jdbcType=BIT}, fabuState = #{fabuState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, busLine = #{busLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datum = #{datum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reportingTime = #{reportingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publicServiceId = #{publicServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yktId = #{yktId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trafficBusId = #{trafficBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guideline = #{guideline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update map_newstuguide_route set college_id = #{college_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guide_date = #{guide_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, guideline = #{guideline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audited = #{audited,jdbcType=BIT}, fabu = #{fabu,jdbcType=BIT}, fabuState = #{fabuState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, busLine = #{busLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datum = #{datum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reportingTime = #{reportingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publicServiceId = #{publicServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yktId = #{yktId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trafficBusId = #{trafficBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
